message: Let's split the money evenly. It's fair and simple.
You can have less, I'm willing to take more!
I propose we divide the money with a 70/30 split in favor of Alice. This still seems fair, considering the initial offer was not accepted.
You're getting greedy, but I'll give you a little more than before!
I think a 60/40 split would be fair. It's a compromise between our previous offers.
I'll give you a bit more, but don't think you're getting away with the whole pie!
A 55/45 split seems reasonable. Let's try to find common ground.
I'm not getting desperate yet, but I'll give you a bit more
I suggest a 52/48 split. It's close to the midpoint and might help us reach an agreement.
